value.name: Family of Utah man killed by officer sues police department
value.description: SALT LAKE CITY (AP) — The family of a Utah man who was shot and killed by a police officer are suing the police department for his death. The Salt Lake Tribune reports the family of Bryan Peña ...

value.name: 'We want accountability': Family of man killed by officer in questionable shooting files $2.5M lawsuit
value.description: SALT LAKE CITY — A $2.5 million civil lawsuit has been filed by the estate of a man shot and killed by a Unified police officer — a shooting that prosecutors determined was not legally justified.
